It's still Counter-Strike. Nuff said. If you're a puppy and don't know what that means play a few rounds and get an education. This is the feel that started it all. All of your calls of doody or battlefeels or wherever else you go to shoot stuff. This is the game that the people who made those games played that made them want to make those games. Goodbye.

After playing over 2.5k hours on 2 accounts I would say this game is one of my all time favourites and worth the money i payed for it by far.
Aside from the problems its faced over the years with hit box's hit reg and the other annoyances I would still say this game is worth playing ONLY WITH PRIME.
The reason i say only with prime is that if you try playing this game non prime you'll be matched with multiple hackers pretty much every game and will just be a waste of your time.
However with prime this game is fucking great not only just competitive is fun whether your sweating your ass off to get to the next rank or just messing around with mates seeing who can get the most zeus kills, cs offers the community servers which have been the majority of my hours spent on this game. servers like surf, bhop, climb, jailbreak just offer a ton of entertainment.

So if your someone whos not played the game yet and is thinking about getting into it just spend the money for prime trust me you'll enjoy it a lot lot more. :D
